'''Shadow Samaritan''' is [[Rosaria]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* 100% CRIT Rate on Rosaria is required to maximize this passive's effects.
* CRIT Rate buffs from Rosaria's [[Regina Probationum]] and/or [[Food]] are added to the calculation. Conditional CRIT Rate buffs, like [[Shattering Ice]] (Cryo Resonance) are not.
